name: Thomas
description:
I love outdoors, football, camping and dancing and swimming traveling and I do these activities only when I am free…. I want to spend the rest of my life with someone who is friendly, honest,
caring, and trustworthy with all good characters. I am easy, love and outgoing man ……I like going to the movies hall or watching movies in my room. I enjoy swimming; listening to music, and also a
good cook. Wow, I must be praising myself right now on these given talents. I am open minded, knowledgeable, wants a family of my own and know how to take care of one. One very interesting attributes is my love for challenges and creativity; I spend most of my time in the office and home.
